description.value:
Trigger You reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points with a phase cutlass.

Your phase cutlass steals some of the enemy's vitality, press-ganging it into eternal servitude. As long as you are wielding a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.Phase Cutlass] with stolen vitality, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Wisp Ally] as a divine innate spell at will, heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level. Using wisp ally this way requires and permanently releases one soul press-ganged with your phase cutlass. The first time each round you Strike with your phase cutlass, you immediately gain the effects of the Sustain a Spell action, which you can use only to extend the duration of and control a wisp ally spell cast using that phase cutlass.
